query.SELECT_CONCERT_HALL: select ID, NAME, LOCATION, CAPACITY, (select count(*) from CONCERT where CONCERT.CONCERT_HALL_ID = HALL.ID) as ASSIGNED from CONCERT_HALL as HALL
query.SELECT_CONCERT: select distinct C.ID, C.NAME, C.TYPE, C.PRICE, (select count(*) from RESERVATION where CONCERT_ID = C.ID and RESERVATION_YN = 'Y') as BOOKED from CONCERT AS C group by C.ID, C.NAME, C.TYPE, C.PRICE order by ID
query.SELECT_AUDIENCE: select ID, NAME, GENDER, AGE from AUDIENCE order by ID
query.INSERT_CONCERT_HALL: insert into CONCERT_HALL (NAME, LOCATION, CAPACITY) values ('%s', '%s', %s)
query.INSERT_CONCERT: insert into CONCERT (NAME, TYPE, PRICE) values ('%s', '%s', %s)
query.INSERT_AUDIENCE: insert into AUDIENCE (NAME, GENDER, AGE) values ('%s', '%s', %s)
query.UPDATE_CONCERT_CONCERT_HALL_ID: update CONCERT set CONCERT_HALL_ID = '%s' where ID = '%s'
query.SELECT_PERFORMANCE: select * from CONCERT_HALL where ID='%s' and 1 = %s
query.SELECT_RESERVATION_BY_SEATNUMS: select CONCERT_ID, SEAT_NO, AUDIENCE_ID, RESERVATION_YN from RESERVATION where CONCERT_ID = '%s' and SEAT_NO IN ('%s') and RESERVATION_YN = '%s'
query.SELECT_CONCERT_HALL_BY_ID: select ID, NAME, LOCATION, CAPACITY from CONCERT_HALL where ID = '%s'
query.DROP_TABLES: drop table RESERVATION, CONCERT, AUDIENCE, CONCERT_HALL;
